Message:
When I first joined the bandits,
my endless thoughts of revenge
would drive me mad.

But, the chief never once
abandoned me.

I haven’t even rewarded them
for saving me, though...

Seeing my anxiety grow,
the chief said to me,

We keep our word,
even if it kills us.”

“So from now on,
this is your home...

What the heck...
You’re outta your mind.
And so, I became a bandit—

a bandit of the cool and
powerful Mountain Tribe.
